'''Stellar Reunion''' is the returnee [[event]] that allows players who meet Returnee Eligibility to receive special rewards. It can be accessed from the {{Icon|Stellar Reunion}} icon at the top left of the screen.

==Returnee Eligibility==
The player is considered to meet Returnee Eligibility when all of the following are met:
* [[Adventure Rank]] 10 or above.
* It has been at least 14 days since last game login.
* It has been over 45 days since last activating the '''Stellar Reunion''' event. 

Additionally, Reunion Gifts will be unlocked upon activating '''Stellar Reunion''' when all of the following are met:
* [[Adventure Rank]] 30 or above.
* It has been at least 45 days since last game login.
* It has been over 60 days since last activating Reunion Gifts.

==Event Details==
The '''Stellar Reunion''' event comprises three parts and lasts 14 days from when it is activated.
* After the event ends, event progress will be cleared and any unclaimed rewards will be lost. Remember to claim your rewards in time!

====Passage of Time====
During the event, log in every day to collect a reward (refreshes every day at 04:00 {{Tt|GMT-5|America}}/{{Tt|GMT+1|Europe}}/{{Tt|GMT+8|Asia}}). Each day's reward can only be claimed once. You can claim rewards for up to 7 days.

====Reunion Blessing====
{{color|menu|Reunion Blessing Additional Double Drops}}<br>Returning Travelers will obtain 28 double drop opportunities during the event, 4 per day. When using Original Resin to activate Petrified Trees and complete [[Domain of Blessing|Domains of Blessing]], [[Domain of Forgery|Forgery]], and [[Domain of Mastery|Mastery]], or complete Blossoms of Revelation and Wealth, you will gain double the rewards. Double drops will refresh at 04:00 every day ({{Tt|GMT-5|America}}/{{Tt|GMT+1|Europe}}/{{Tt|GMT+8|Asia}}), so don't forget to use them in time.

{{color|menu|"Returning Companions" Key-Free Hangouts}}<br>You may unlock up to 3 Hangout Events for free during this time. Unlocking said Hangout Events will consume uses of "Returning Companions" instead of Story Keys as long as you have uses remaining, so be sure to make use of this opportunity.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|'''Event Rules'''<br>During the event, returning Travelers can claim a special set of Reunion Rewards once. At the same time, you can take part in "Passage of Time" and "Homeward Path" event quests. Upon completion, Travelers can claim corresponding rewards. You will also receive the "Reunion Blessing" and enjoy bonus drops during this period!<br><br>'''Passage of Time Login Rewards'''<br>Returning Travelers can log in every day to claim rewards (refreshes daily at 4:00 AM {{Tt|GMT-5|America}}/{{Tt|GMT+1|Europe}}/{{Tt|GMT+8|Asia}}). Only one login reward can be claimed each day for up to 7 days.<br><br>'''Homeward Path Reunion Quests Rewards'''<br>Returning Travelers can complete designated Quests to obtain points and claim rewards. As your accumulated points reach each tier, you can claim a reward. The reward at each tier can be claimed only once. The four segments will open sequentially every day at 4:00 AM ({{Tt|GMT-5|America}}/{{Tt|GMT+1|Europe}}/{{Tt|GMT+8|Asia}}), so please take note!<br>(Your accumulated login quest will also update at 4:00 AM ({{Tt|GMT-5|America}}/{{Tt|GMT+1|Europe}}/{{Tt|GMT+8|Asia}}). You will be required to log in again to refresh the accumulated login value.)<br><br>'''Reunion Blessing Double Drop Bonus'''<br>Returning Travelers receive 21 opportunities across the event period to gain double drops, of which 3 may be used by Returning Travelers each day. These can be used to obtain double the rewards from Petrified Trees in Domains of Blessing, Forgery, and Mastery, or from Ley Line Blossoms of Revelation and Wealth using Original Resin. The amount of double drop opportunities refreshes daily at 4:00 AM ({{Tt|GMT-5|America}}/{{Tt|GMT+1|Europe}}/{{Tt|GMT+8|Asia}}). Do use these opportunities in time.|Event Guidelines}}
{{Description|'''Reward Rules'''<br>During Stellar Reunion, returning Travelers who take part in and complete "Reunion Locales" and "Homeward Path," and complete character Level-Up objectives or consume certain amounts of Original Resin can obtain Reunion EXP. Reach specific Reunion EXP breakpoints to obtain the corresponding rewards.<br>'''Duration'''<br>Reunion Gifts shares a duration with Stellar Reunion, so collect your rewards in time.|Reunion Reward Rules}}
{{Description|You can obtain Reunion EXP by completing specific missions, exploring specific areas, and leveling characters up|Reunion EXP Records}}
{{Description|'''Passage of Time Total Login Rewards'''<br>During the event, log in every day to collect a reward (refreshes every day at 04:00 ({{Tt|GMT-5|America}}/{{Tt|GMT+1|Europe}}/{{Tt|GMT+8|Asia}})). Each day's reward can only be claimed once. You can claim rewards for up to 7 days.|Reunion EXP Records}}
{{Description|'''"Reunion Blessing" Temporary Domain Opening'''<br>During Stellar Reunion, some Domains will not be limited by their usual time restrictions and will remain open. After Stellar Reunion ends, these Domains will go back to their normal schedule, so challenge them while they are available.<br>'''"Reunion Blessing" Additional Double Drops'''<br>Returning Travelers will obtain 21 double drop opportunities during the event, 3 per day. When using Original Resin to activate Petrified Trees and complete Domains of Blessing, Forgery, and Mastery, or complete Blossoms of Revelation and Wealth, you will gain double the rewards. Double drops will refresh at 04:00 every day ({{Tt|GMT-5|America}}/{{Tt|GMT+1|Europe}}/{{Tt|GMT+8|Asia}}), so don't forget to use them in time.<br><br>'''"Returning Companions" Key-Free Hangouts'''<br>You may unlock up to 3 Hangout Events for free during this time. Unlocking said Hangout Events will consume uses of "Returning Companions" instead of Story Keys as long as you have uses remaining, so be sure to make use of this opportunity.|Reunion Blessing Event Guidelines}}
{{Description|During Stellar Reunion, some Domains will not be limited by their usual time restrictions and will remain open.<br>After Stellar Reunion ends, these Domains will go back to their normal schedule, so challenge them while they are available.|Stellar Reunion: Domains Unlocked, [[Adventurer Handbook]]}}
